title: Political Group of Okinawa Revolution
text:
The is a local <a href="political%20party">political party</a> in <a href="Okinawa">Okinawa</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. "Seitō" means "political party", while "sōzō" may mean or . Contrary to what its official English name might suggest, the party is considered as largely <a href="conservative">conservative</a>.
The party was founded on December 27, 2005 by <a href="Mikio%20Shimoji">Mikio Shimoji</a>. He has been the member of the <a href="Liberal%20Democratic%20Party%20%28Japan%29">Liberal Democratic Party</a>, at the <a href="House%20of%20Representatives%20of%20Japan">House of Representatives</a> of the <a href="Diet%20of%20Japan">National Diet</a>. In July 2005, he left LDP as he was against the alliance between LDP and <a href="New%20Komeito%20Party">New Komeito Party</a>. He then founded the Political Group of Okinawa Revolution.
As a local conservative party formed recently, the party is similar to <a href="New%20Party%20Daichi">New Party Daichi</a> in <a href="Hokkaid%C5%8D">Hokkaidō</a>.
